name: TonyMantz-YourMusicIndustryMentor
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Tony Mantz offers his take on life in general, life as a creative and life in the music industry. With over 30 years in the mentoring industry, preparing musicians and artists for life outside of the studio. Tony is a keynote speaker and has traveled all over the world working with some big names in the music industry.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
